hadiths.text: Narrated AbuShurayb al-Ka'bi: The Prophet (ﷺ) said: Then you, Khuza'ah, have killed this man of Hudhayl, but I will pay his blood-wit. After these words of mine if a man of anyone is killed, his people will have a choice to accept blood-wit or to kill him

chapter.eng-name: The Heir Of The One Who Was Killed Deliberately Taking The Diyah
